name: NO_COLUMN
desc: There is no %s column in %s table

name: NOT_FK
desc: Chosen column %s is not a foreign key

name: MISSING_PART
desc: An important part of the query is missing

name: ALIAS
desc: There are no quotes between a space separated alias %s
sugg: Add quotes to the %s part of query

name: WHERE
desc: There is an aggregate function %s in WHERE

name: INCORRECT_TYPE
desc: Missmatching data types in the query

name: CSV_INCORRECT
desc: Incorrect structure of csv file for %s table
sugg: Choose another csv file or table
